## CardaNostraAdaSpinner.color property

Get Element Color.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get color(): string;

set color(value: string);
```

## Example


```ts
let spinner = new CardaNostraAdaSpinner({id="element-id", color:"green"});
const spinnerColor = spinner.color;
// green
```
